name: Better Comment Section
description: Hides spam comments from levels & lists.

Hide bot comments.name: Hide bot comments
Hide bot comments.description: Hides bot comments, like comments from 3eelol or Hahayeahbot. This features only hides known bot commenters.

Hide brainrot comments.name: Hide brainrot comments
Hide brainrot comments.description: Hides comments that contain brainrot keywords, like 'skibidi' and 'only in ohio'. This features is a little funny joke I thought of while adding settings.

Hide ads.name: Hide ads
Hide ads.description: Hides comments that ask people to play levels they made.

Log actions.name: Log actions
Log actions.description: Logs what comment got blocked and why it did in Geode's Platform Console (or just in the geode log files)
